title: AuthMeReloaded登录和LP权限插件冲突
author: Lonewolfi
txt_content:
只加AuthMeReloaded插件没有事情,但是加上LP权限插件之后,就会这样报错,有没有什么解决办法

[15:12:30] [Server thread/WARN]: [Server thread] INFO fr.xephi.authme.libs.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource - AuthMeMYSQLPool - Starting...
[15:12:30] [Server thread/WARN]: [Server thread] INFO fr.xephi.authme.libs.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource - AuthMeMYSQLPool - Start completed.
[15:12:30] [Server thread/INFO]: [AuthMe] MySQL setup finished
[15:12:31] [Server thread/WARN]: [AuthMe] Aborting initialization of AuthMe: [InjectorReflectionException]: Could not invoke method 'setup' for fr.xephi.authme.permission.PermissionsManager@2e96b2c0
[15:12:31] [Server thread/WARN]: [AuthMe] THE SERVER IS GOING TO SHUT DOWN AS DEFINED IN THE CONFIGURATION!
[15:12:31] [Server thread/INFO]: [AuthMe] Waiting for 0 tasks to finish
[15:12:31] [Server thread/WARN]: [Server thread] INFO fr.xephi.authme.libs.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource - AuthMeMYSQLPool - Shutdown initiated...
[15:12:31] [Server thread/WARN]: [Server thread] INFO fr.xephi.authme.libs.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource - AuthMeMYSQLPool - Shutdown completed.

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
Lonewolfi 发表于 2020-7-29 16:14
# Forces authme to hook into Vault instead of a specific permission handler system.
    forceVault ...
说错话了
改成true
刚睡醒脑子有点晕

replies.author: Lonewolfi
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-7-29 16:13
authme/config.yml中
修改forcevaulthook为false
# Forces authme to hook into Vault instead of a specific permission handler system.
    forceVaultHook: false
默认就是false.........
